summary: An FBI notification form regarding Jeffrey Epstein's planned travel to France in September-October 2016, classifying him as a traveling Child Sex Offender (CSO) and alerting relevant authorities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the FBI notification form, identified as a Child Sex Offender (CSO) planning international travel to France.

events.title: Epstein's planned travel to France
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is planning to travel to France.

events.title: Epstein's scheduled departure from France
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is scheduled to depart from France.

keyFacts: The FBI classified Jeffrey Epstein as a 'traveling Child Sex Offender (CSO)' in 2016.
Epstein planned to travel to France from September 24 to October 5, 2016.
The document is an FBI notification form (Form J-1057) intended to alert authorities about Epstein's international travel.
The document is marked as UNCLASSIFIED//FOUO (For Official Use Only).
The case ID referenced is 163G-PA-2062010 under Violent Incident Crime Matters International.
